naslov: ***Dvije ville (moderna i autohtona) s predivnim pogledom, 600 m2*** (prodaja)
opis: ***Dvije ville(moderna i autohtona)s predivnim pogledom, 600 m2*** ~ Vile s podrumima 600m2, Zemljište 3.200m2 ~ Dvije lijepe vile nude svojim gostima prekrasan pogled na dalmatinske otoke i grad Split. Najbliža plaža se nalazi samo 1 km od vila ~ Svaka vila ima 240m2 i sastoji se od dvije etaže. Idealne su za 16 osoba. Svaka vila sastoji se od tri spavaće sobe. Dva su opremljena bračnim krevetom i krevetom za jednu osobu. Treća soba je opremljena s dva kreveta za jednu osobu. Spavaće sobe su vrlo prostrane i osunčane, nudeći svojim gostima osjećaj krajnje udobnosti. Spavaće sobe također su opremljene klima-uređajem. Tu su i tri en-suite kupaonice ~ U prizemlju ćete naći potpuno opremljenu, modernu kuhinju koja se otvara pred blagoj blagovaonici i udobnom dnevnom boravku. Dnevni boravak je opremljen kaminom i učinit će vam da se osjećate kao kod kuće ~ Ispred Vila, nalaze se prekrasni beskonacni bazeni (36m2) ~ Budući da su vile smještene na padini, gosti uživaju u izvanrednom pogledu. Tu je roštilj i vanjski prostor za jelo, savršen za pripremanje obroka s obitelji i prijateljima ~ Ako želite imati apsolutnu privatnost, ali i dalje biti u blizini većih gradova i prekrasnih plaža morate kupiti ove dvije ljepotice NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3% ***Two Villas (Modern and Indigenous) with Stunning Sea View, 600 m2 *** ~Villas with basement 600m2, Land 3.200m2 ~Two beautiful Villas are offering its guests a breathtaking view of the Dalmatian islands and the city of Split.The nearest beach is located just 1km from the villas ~Each Villa has 240m2 and consists of two floors. It is ideal for 16 persons. Each villa consists of three bedrooms. Two are equipped with a double bed and a single bed. The third bedroom is equipped with two single beds. The bedrooms are very spacious and sunlit, offering their guests the feeling of ultimate comfort.The bedrooms are also equipped with air-conditioning. There are also three en-suite bathrooms ~On the ground floor, you will find a fully equipped, modern kitchen opening up to a beautiful dining area and a comfortable living room. The living room is equipped with a fireplace and will make you feel like home ~Outside the Villas, there are a beautiful swimming pools (36m2), surrounded by sun loungers ~The Villa’s greatest asset is its unspoilt view of the crystal clear Adriatic Sea. Since the Villas are located on a hillside, the guests enjoy the extraordinary view .There is also a BBQ area and an outdoor eating area, perfect for preparing fresh meals with your family and friends If you wish to have a absolute privacy, but still be in the vicinity of bigger towns and beautiful beaches you have to buy these two beauties 21.REAL ESTATE & TOURISM CENTURY d.o.o. www.21stcroatia.com Marmontova 5 21 000 Split CROATA NOTE: Agency commission for the buyer: 3%
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
